‘Hero’ mum Traci Te Paa dies saving daughter and nephew from rip at Waimamaku Beach, Northland https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/hero-mum-traci-te-paa-dies- saving-daughter-and-nephew-from-rip-at-waimamaku-beach-northland/OI7BV7EMHRD2ZJRH4ORFDRJ3SY/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/hero-mum-traci-te-paa-dies- saving-daughter-and-nephew-from-rip-at-waimamaku-beach-northland/OI7BV7EMHRD2ZJRH4ORFDRJ3SY/ Georgina CampbellTraci Te Paa was pulled from the water at a remote Northland beach but couldn't be revived Fri, 27 Dec 2024 16:00:00 +0000 Traci Te Paa drowned after saving her daughter and nephew from a rip at Waimamaku Beach on Christmas Eve.
Rotorua child abuse case: Nia Glassie’s murderers, brothers Wiremu and Michael Curtis, up for parole https://www.nzherald.co.nz/rotorua-daily-post/news/rotorua-child-abuse-case-nia-glassies-murderers-brothers-wiremu-and-michael-curtis-up-for-parole/ 3TUZFOGKGRGWLGZSSE7GTXPA2E/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/rotorua-daily-post/news/rotorua-child-abuse-case-nia-glassies-murderers-brothers-wiremu-and-michael-curtis-up-for-parole/ 3TUZFOGKGRGWLGZSSE7GTXPA2E/ Kelly MakihaIt's been 17 years since Nia Glassie was killed. Now her killers want out of jail. Fri, 27 Dec 2024 16:00:00 +0000 Michael (left) and Wiremu Curtis are up for parole in January and February respectively for the murder of Nia Glassie in 2007.
